ValidationRule.description: Check if Reason for contact, technical/customer issue, and customer struggle are populated when case is closed. Developed as part of jira 996
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed") && OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Initial_Reason_For_Contact__c)), ISPICKVAL(Initial_Reason_For_Contact__c,"Phone Case - please complete"), AND( OR(ISBLANK(TEXT(Customer_Struggle__c)), ISPICKVAL(Customer_Struggle__c,"Phone Case - please complete"), ISPICKVAL(Customer_Struggle__c,"Webform case - please review"), ISPICKVAL(Customer_Struggle__c,"System - please review")), AND( ISBLANK(TEXT(Customer_Issue__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(Technical_Issue__c )))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select options from the "Initial reason for contact", "Customer Struggle", or "Customer/Technical Issue" fields to continue.
